runs.comm: quick single to the on side, Gambhir drops it down and the Mills runs forward and under arms it wide of the stumps
good length outside the off stump and defended to the off side
superb timing there by Kohli, it was not a bad ball, gave him a fraction of room outside off and he opened the face of the bat and caressed it wide of point
sweetly timed punch off the front foot square on the off side, third man does well to run across and cut it off
bowls it straighter and he gets behind the line and defends
a bit too straight on the pads and he works it with his wrists down to deep square leg
Milne starts off poorly, too wide and short outside off, reaches out and bludgeons it wide of cover
tucks it off the body to the leg side and takes the single, Kohli thinks of the second
drifts down the leg side and he works it to the leg side
makes room and cuts close to the body on the back foot and he chops it wide of point
once again Kohli uses the extra pace of Milne, too full on the stumps and forced down the ground, Oram dives in vain at mid-on
fullish delivery outside off and he steers it wide of point
comes down the track and he adjusts and flicks it behind square on the leg side
foxed him there outside the off stump, bowled on the corridor, an awkward Gambhir poked his bat out
Gambhir gives him the charge early this time, Mills bowls it a bit short and Gambhir carves it over and wide of point
Kohli decides to use his feet, comes down the track and lofts crisply down the ground and through the line, clears mid-off
neatly tucked away down to midwicket for a single

Mills times his dive and takes a good catch! It was the off cutter and Gambhir was back at the crease trying to work it away to the on side, ends up chipping it towards the bowler, the ball dipped but Mills dived and managed to catch it inches from the turf
slower ball and he pushes it softly down the pitch
tucks it away wide of short fine leg for a single
tight over so far from Oram, tries to dab it wide of point
sloppy work at cover point! Short and a touch wide outside off, Raina made room and slapped that pretty hard, Hira made a mess of the dive at cover point
bowls it short and he stays back and pulls wide of square leg
nice timing there from Kohli, comes well forward to the pitch of the ball and pushes it just wide of mid-off who dives and can't stop it
close call! Tucked to the leg side and the throw was just wide of the stumps at the bowler's end
he's in imperious touch! Tossed up outside off and he waited at the crease for it to turn and cut it away wide of point
comes forward and defends
manages to bisect a narrow gap between point and short third man, played it late and cut it past them, the fielder does well to run after it and pull it back
tucked to the leg side but straight to short fine leg
comes forward and punches it back to the bowler
a touch short and he stays back and cuts down to backward point
comes round the wicket and tucks him up for room, he stays back and defends
makes a bit of room and tries to pinch it wide of point but tells his partner to wait
Oram continues to keep him quiet, he made room to slap that over cover, looked like the slower ball again
and Raina manages to find his way around all of them! Oram dragged it a bit too short, Raina made room and he slapped that past cover point and backward point

Dropped by Milne! He actually had that covered, it was smashed hard and flat to mid-off's left, Milne went across and got his hands behind it, it stuck for a couple of seconds and when his elbow hit the turf the ball popped out so he wasn't in control
short outside off and he reaches out and punches it wide of backward point, timing again
gets across and clips it softly towards midwicket
streaky! It was short and Kohli was aiming to hook that, took the top edge and cleared a leaping McCullum
comes down the track and adjusts by pushing it softly towards cover
chips down the track and works it to mid-off
opens the face of the bat and steers it down to third man
gets forward and drives to long-off
down the track and he pushes a full delivery to long-off
makes room to a fuller delivery and he crashes that down to deep cover, the sweeper just about mops up
opens the face and steers it just wide of point
makes a bit of room and he pushes a full delivery down to long-off
fires it flat outside off and he makes room and cuts to deep point
goes back at the crease and he rocks back and cuts to sweeper cover
gets back at the crease and clips it to the on side
comes down the track and pushes a full delivery to long-off
flatter delivery and he pushes it to long-on

gets to his fifty with a four! Kohli chips down the track and lofts him inside out with the turn, in the air but Williamson did not time his run and dive well from deep extra cover, bounced in front of him and rolled to the rope
punches it down to long-off
flatter delivery and he comes down the track and gets an inside edge to the on side, its the 50 stand
down the track and works it to long-on
gets forward and drills it to long-off
swings and mistimes it to the leg side, quite a few fielders converging to the ball
tossed up on middle and leg and Raina chips down the track to the pitch of the ball and lofted it over long-on, it was a flat six but well over the fielder
comes forward and pushes it to long-off
angles it across the left-hander and no shot offered
soft dismissal! Mills gets his second wicket with the off cutter, full outside off and chipped straight to Taylor at short cover
defends off the meat of the bat, punched towards point and he thought of the single
gets off the mark with a easy clip to square leg, moving his feet well, good signs
good length outside off and he opens the face and steers it to third man
hops at the crease and defends, Yuvraj ensuring he defends with the meat of the bat
Kohli really takes to Milne here, comes down the track to a fuller delivery, makes a bit of room and drives him in the air and wide of mid-off's dive
opens the face of the bat and dabs it down to third man
Milne lets it slip by bowling a low full toss wide of the off stump, reaches out and steers it wide of point, sweeper dives and saves it
streaky boundary but he will take it! Milne comes round the wicket and bowls it full and wide outside off, reaches out and gets an outside edge well wide of slip
solid meaty punch, he had the width and Yuvraj reached out and bashed it to sweeper cover

Yuvraj is dropped and we have a nasty collision here! McCullum and Mills the two men involved and Mills doesn't look in good shape at all I'm afraid, Yuvraj went for the pull and got a thick top edge down to fine leg, the two men went for it, they collided and the ball rolled towards the boundary before it was picked up. McCullum is getting the gloves on. Daniel Vettori will bowl
tossed up on off and middle and driven down the ground to long-off
Yuvraj of the old! Effortless! Tossed up on the off stump and Yuvraj used the crease, got across and lofted it over wide long-on
tossed up on middle and clipped to the on side for a single
Vettori's getting caned here! Tossed up on the off stump and he chips down the track and lofts flat over wide long-off
gives it too much air and it's a full toss drilled down the ground to long-on
works it down the ground to long-on
slower ball on the pads and he tucks it to mid-on
Southee times his dive well! Looked like the slower one from Franklin, Kohli made room and tried to loft it over long-off, it was flat and Southee ran forward and took it well on the dive
drifts on the pads and he tucks it to square leg
don't know how to describe that shot! He didn't know whether to play or leave it, the ball made contact with the bat somehow and rolled on the pitch
uses his wrists well and clips it wide of midwicket
stabs it wide of cover point for a single
gets an inside edge onto the pads, McCullum is a bit excited
clips it softly to the leg side
poor delivery down the leg side, Yuvraj swings and misses
quicker delivery and he drills it back to the bowler
teases him by tossing it up slowly, Dhoni decides to defend in the last minute
stays back and punches it to the off side
fuller delivery on the pads and whipped to deep midwicket
slower ball on the off stump and pushed to point
slower ball on the pads and he clips it to the on side
clips it down to deep square leg
pulls him down to deep square leg
stays back and works it to deep square leg
punches it to the off side for a single
tries to flick it but he misses it
big appeal for a lbw! Oram is very confident and he starts celebrating before looking at the umpire, the ball hit the back pad and rolled away, the umpire thinks about it and gives it not out
clips it wide of deep midwicket
Dhoni goes for the slash and gets an under edge to the keeper
just wide of long-on, Dhoni went for the pull and Guptill at long-on ran to his right and the ball evaded him and rolled over to the rope
slogs and gets an inside edge to the on side and they can only take a single
Yuvraj goes for the big swing and misses it completely, good slower ball from Franklin
slower ball and slightly short and he swivels and pulls down to deep square leg, pick up a couple
drills it down the pitch and Franklin appears to get a finger to it before hitting the stumps, Dhoni was home
pulls this one in front of square and really pushes Yuvraj for the second run but he makes it
bowls it shorter and he pulls it down to long-on and they don't risk a second run
Yuvraj goes for a tired slog but fails to make proper contact and gets an inside edge to short fine leg, India need boundaries
good slower ball from Oram, Dhoni goes for the pull and swings it too early and the ball clips his body and rolls away
trust Yuvraj to come up with the big one when it mattered! Fuller delivery and he gets across and swings and connects really well, goes long and high over deep midwicket
good slower ball, Yuvraj targets the on side again and the ball clips his body and rolls to the off side
Franklin fires it on the pads on seeing Yuvraj making room, the ball hits the pads and rolls to the off side
that siphons off four off the total! Franklin errs by bowling it too short, Dhoni was at the crease to size him up, one flat pull and it was scorching to deep square leg
Franklin makes the mistake by bowling it too wide outside the off stump, Dhoni wisely leaves it alone
full on the pads and he drills it down to long-on, they settle for the single only

Yuvraj swings and misses! Relief for Franklin, it was a slower delivery from the back of the hand, Yuvraj was at the crease to smash that over the on side and he swung too early and the ball crashed on middle and off
that's not a bad shot, picks it on off and middle and he smashes it down to long-on, the fielder just manages to pick it

New Zealand win by one run! Rohit fetches that from the off stump and clubs it down the ground, long-on calmly jogs to his left and ensures he gets behind the line of the ball, flings it to the keeper and India can pick up only two
